SEARCH
Package Game

Interface MovementControl

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEngine
public interface MovementControl
The MovementControl interface defines the operations necessary for managing and controlling vehicle movements within a simulated traffic network. Implementing classes are responsible for updating vehicle positions, validating movement decisions, and analyzing the traffic environment.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Vehicle>
    checkRegion(Vehicle vehicle, ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles)
    Checks the immediate region around a specific vehicle and identifies other vehicles that are in close proximity.
    ArrayList<TrafficElement>
    probeMapSurroundings(Vehicle vehicle)
    Probes the map for traffic elements (such as other vehicles, traffic signs, or obstacles) that are in the vicinity of the specified vehicle.
    ArrayList<Vehicle>
    updateVehiclesPosition(TrafficNetwork trafficNetwork, ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles)
    Updates the positions of a list of vehicles within the specified traffic network.
    Position
    validateMoveChoice(Vehicle vehicle, Position newPosition)
    Validates a vehicle's proposed new position within the traffic network to ensure it is a feasible and safe move, given the current traffic conditions and network constraints.

  • Method Details

    • updateVehiclesPosition

      ArrayList<Vehicle> updateVehiclesPosition(TrafficNetwork trafficNetwork, ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles)
      Updates the positions of a list of vehicles within the specified traffic network.
      Parameters:
      trafficNetwork - The traffic network within which the vehicles are moving.
      vehicles - The list of vehicles whose positions are to be updated.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Vehicle objects with their updated positions.

    • checkRegion

      ArrayList<Vehicle> checkRegion(Vehicle vehicle, ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles)
      Checks the immediate region around a specific vehicle and identifies other vehicles that are in close proximity.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle for which the surrounding region is being checked.
      vehicles - A list of vehicles to consider when checking the region.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Vehicle objects that are located near the specified vehicle.

    • validateMoveChoice

      Position validateMoveChoice(Vehicle vehicle, Position newPosition)
      Validates a vehicle's proposed new position within the traffic network to ensure it is a feasible and safe move, given the current traffic conditions and network constraints.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle attempting to move.
      newPosition - The proposed new position for the vehicle.
      Returns:
      The Position object representing the validated position for the vehicle. This may be the same as the proposed position if the move is valid, or an adjusted position.

    • probeMapSurroundings

      ArrayList<TrafficElement> probeMapSurroundings(Vehicle vehicle)
      Probes the map for traffic elements (such as other vehicles, traffic signs, or obstacles) that are in the vicinity of the specified vehicle. This information can be used to make informed movement decisions.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle for which the surroundings are being probed.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of TrafficElement objects representing the traffic elements found near the specified vehicle.
